maedaleaders.title: Re: John Maeda - Design's importance in business
maedaleaders.description: John Maeda argues that designers should be business leaders because they focus too much on beauty.

sawyers-toy.title: How a kitschy photo souvenir made the world smaller
sawyers-toy.description: The next-generation of immersive technologies is built on the humble beginnings of a toy from 1939.
